1 CD: Disc(s) . Genre: Action-Adventure

Another World 15th Anniversary Edition is a new and
enhanced version of the classic Another World (also
known as Out of This World, which chronicles the story
of a young physicist being hurtled through space and
time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. As the
protagonist players must dodge, outwit, and overcome the
host of alien monsters and deadly earthquakes that
plague the alien landscape
